taskDescription: Galactose, one of the eight essential monosaccharides (Section 25.7), is biosynthesized from UDP-glucose by galactose 4-epimerase, where UDP = uridylyl diphosphate (a ribonucleotide diphosphate; Section 28.1). The enzyme requires NAD+ for activity (Section 17.7), but it is not a stoichiometric reactant, and NADH is not a final reaction product. Propose a mechanism.
